They showed up at the autopool, and someone had just returned a brand new AAAC Voya Voya â€” incredible. It was like Christ himself had blessed them. It only (barely) seat five, and there were six of them, but it wasnâ€™t a problem.

item.title: A Most Beautiful Woman
item.description: When Tzipora first laid eyes on Ayn, hours after her arrival in the country, she thought, â€œthatâ€™s the most beautiful woman Iâ€™ve ever seen.â€ It wasnâ€™t just her features or figure that captured Tziporaâ€™s attention â€” it was also her confident, inconspicuous movements and a quiet self-assuredness that seemed obvious in her gentle expression and posture. Tzipora was not quite sure how to describe it. Her beauty was very alive in the way she inhabited a space, as she walked into the hotel lounge to meet them.
